availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lebanon, Kentucky, attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mary S. Davis Fogle. Married to Lizzie Lawrence Fogle on October 24, 1865. Father of John A. Fogle, Clinton Fogle, William Fogle, Martha Fogle, and Elizabeth Fogle.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, stamped p. 326. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, Lebanon District 2, p. 104. Find A Grave, "James M. Fogle (1820-1871)," Memorial # 112726125 http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=112726125&ref=acom (accessed 14 June 2016). Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1844-1854, Ancestry, Marriages, Mercer County, 1846. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Marriages, Jefferson County, 1865.
